title: A man committing suicide on Harriet Tubman replaced Andrew Jackson on the $20 bill.
subtitle: A false news report said that a man killed himself because of the Treasury's decision to add an African-American image of the abolition of the death penalty to the $20 bill.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A man killed himself because of the Treasury's decision to add an African-American image of the abolition of the death penalty to the $20 bill.
